[[Image:Pinkmaiden Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Pinkmaiden on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''Pinkmaiden''' is a castle in [[the Riverlands]], the area controlled by [[House Tully]] of [[Riverrun]]. The castle is located south of [[Riverrun]], near the border with [[the Westerlands]] and a tributary of the Red Fork of [[the Trident]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/harrenhal/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Harrenhal entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels Pinkmaiden is the seat of House Piper. It was one of the settlements sacked by [[Gregor Clegane]] at the beginning of the [[War of the Five Kings]].
